CustomField.description: Field to be used in roll-up summary field on opportunity. Nation Value currency field can't be used directly in roll-up since Advanced Multi-currency is Enabled in org. US-2276, SGPRT-1229
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount that SB will be providing the client in relation to the specific facility (sum of the selldown and the amount SB will hold)
CustomField.label: SB Gross Participation (Num)
